brief.brief: A message to display when the field is in error.

When a field is in error, Service Manager displays a message describing the error condition. The message you specify here overrides the default message with a customized message that describes the error better.
Service Manager displays this message when the Allow Many? option is true.

detail.detail: If the Val Query does not find any records, Service Manager displays the message:
No records found running the secondary query.
If the Val query finds many records, Service Manager displays the message:
Many records found running the secondary query.
Use the nullsub function when including variable data in a concatenated message. Otherwise, a variable whose value is NULL renders the entire message NULL.
